web_snippets: Ida Tin (born 28 May 1979) is a Danish internet entrepreneur and author who is the co-founder and CEO of the women's menstruation-tracking app, Clue.
Ida Tin is a Danish internet entrepreneur, author and the co-founder of Clue. Ida is credited with coining the term femtech.
